<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<TopEnemy> it = newTopEnemy.iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
i = i + 1;
names.add(it.next().enemyX - ammo[q].positionX);
}
<<<explanation>>>: It seems like you are trying to remove elements from the ArrayList while iterating over it. This will cause a ConcurrentModificationException. Instead, you should remove the element from the ArrayList after you are done using it in the iteration.
Also, you are using the variable i which is not defined in the scope of the for loop.
